text: looking for a quick and healthy way to
get energized here are a few of my
favorite nutrient packed smoothies that
will help quench your thirst and make
you feel your best
mango is one of my favorite things to
use in a smoothie because it's sweet and
tangy but have you considered tahini
this awesome smoothie is so simple it's
just 1 cup of frozen mango half a cup of
water now for the secret ingredient 1
tbsp of tahini this is blended sesame
seeds lends a really nice nutty flavor
healthy fats good amount of protein and
it's just something different if you
feel like you've been missing out on
vegetables lately try this cream machine
smoothie mostly vegetables a couple of
fruit items and it's really good for you
awesome way to start your day great way
to perk up in the afternoon I'm just
going to chop my pineapple here and I
wanted to show you a fun trick when
you're removing the rind from the
pineapple save these to infuse your
water I think it's a great way to rev up
your normal picture of drinking water
during the day now when you are using
vegetable rinds or citrus rinds or any
of those things just make sure that
everything is washed and scrubbed well
now trim off the bottom because we have
so many greens going in this smoothie
it's nice to balance that out with a
little bit of natural sweetness and we
get that from chopped mango and chopped
pineapple smoothies are one of my
favorite ways to get so many nutritious
ingredients into one glass and for
breakfast
this blueberry almond butter smoothie
has flax seeds this is something I'm
always trying to incorporate into my
diet so to start I'm going to peel one
ripe banana make sure you have a really
nice bright one here this is going to
add nice body to our smoothie just break
it up for sweetness I'm going to add
three dates these are just pitted
medjool dates tablespoon of fresh lemon
juice this is a great way to start your
morning I have three tablespoons of
almond butter the almond butter is going
to add tons of fiber flavor
Coffee fats but more importantly protein
which is what I'm looking for in the
morning now I'm going to add one and a
half cups blueberries I'm using frozen
blueberries here and this is a great
smoothie for any time of the year if
you're using fresh in the middle of
summer just add a couple of ice cubes
for nice consistency now final touch two
tablespoons of whole flax seeds I like
to start with whole flax seeds and then
grind them either in a food processor or
in a blender with a smoothie that's how
you're able to absorb all the wonderful
essential fatty acids especially
omega-3s this strawberry grapefruit
ginger smoothie is invigorating chock
full of vitamin C and it makes a big
batch so you only have to make it once
every three days start by peeling a
grapefruit and the way I like to peel
grapefruit is just start it with a
little help of the knife and then peel
it like an orange and the reason I like
to do this is because you end up with
more fiber from this pity layer and you
get a spray all the delicious essential
oils all over your cutting board which
just wakes you up one of the things I
love about smoothies is that you keep
all of the fiber from your fruits and
vegetables and that really helps you
feel fuller longer
delicious
you
